actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.
Reported to House from the Committee on the District of Columbia, H. Rept. 95-247.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.
Measure laid on table, S. 1322 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to revise the basis for estimating the annual Federal payment to the District of Columbia for water and water services and sanitary sewer services furnished to the United States.

summary.text: Requires the Mayor of the District of Columbia to include in the annual budget estimates of the Mayor, beginning with fiscal year 1977, the estimated value of water, water services, and sanitary sewer services to be furnished to the United States during the fiscal year for which such budget estimates were prepared. Stipulates that nothing contained in this Act relieves the United States of its obligation to make payments for the water, water services and sewer services provided prior to fiscal year 1977. Requires payment by October 1, 1977 for all such services outstanding on that date, subject to adjustment within two fiscal years.

titles.title: A bill to revise the basis for estimating the annual Federal payment to the District of Columbia for water and water services and sanitary sewer services furnished to the United States.
